text: Hey there, I'm Alexis from ElevenLabs support. How can I help you today?
Hello there! I'm VoiceCare Assistant, and I'm so glad you're here. To help me get to know you better, could you please tell me your name?

It's lovely to meet you, Maitri. I'm here to help make your life a little easier and safer. To start, could you tell me what kind of help you need most? Are you looking for reminders, emergency monitoring, or perhaps just someone to talk to?

That's perfectly fine, Maitri. I can certainly help with all of those things. To ensure your safety is my top priority, could you please tell me who your primary emergency contact is? This way, I'll know who to reach out to if you ever need urgent assistance.

Thank you, Maitri. Knowing your son is your primary emergency contact is very helpful. I also want to let you know that I can call you for medicine reminders, which can be a great way to stay on track with your health.
